mapper.select: select * from b_warehouse w left join sys_dictionary dic on dic.dictionary_code = w.warehouse_type left join sys_dictionary country on country.dictionary_code = w.country left join sys_dictionary city on city.dictionary_code = w.city left join sys_dictionary area on area.dictionary_code = w.area where dic.is_del ='1' and (country.is_del='1' or country.is_del is null) and (city.is_del='1' or country.is_del is null) and (area.is_del='1' or country.is_del is null)
select * from b_warehouse where org_id is null
